website_summaries.verdict: This grain- and vegetable-based wet dog food has a completely vegan formula, right down to the vitamins.
pros: Stands out for its balanced omega-6 and omega-3 ratios
Helps give your dog a shiny coat and healthy skin
Provides a good balance of complex carbohydrates and protein
Highly digestible, even for canines with sensitive stomachs
cons: Some customers report receiving dented cans

customer_reviews.title: This product used to be great and I bought it for a long time at ...
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be great and I bought it for a long time at Amazon. However the last two cases I bought were too mushy in consistency as if there was something wrong with the formula, or perhaps the formula had changed. My dog wont eat it anymore. I have since bought a couple of cans from Petco to check and the consistency was much firmer like it always had been. I am not sure what to do now, I do not feel like buying it again from Amazon and then dealing with returning it if it is still mushy... Perhaps someone at Amazon can look into this for us? I read another review with exactly the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Samwiser

customer_reviews.title: Food: good. Delivery: bad
customer_reviews.text: Note: This review is not for the food, which is fine. My dogs like it and they are happy and healthy. The last case I had delivered had several cams that were dented and crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great food for your dog needing a vegetarian diet
customer_reviews.text: Great food for your dog needing a vegetarian diet! Unfortunately, what your getting is 2nd. quality canned from Natural Balance! When you open a can of this, it's got a fatty gray substance on the surface. Its extremely sticky also. Watch for choking accidents. No kidding! Bought a case from pet shop near by. Great texture! Not sticky! Beau loved it! Hes been a little constipated lately, glad we were able to get a good case of fresh food! Also, most were dented. Showed you that Amazon is selling second rate dog food stuff. Buyer beware. Also, pet store sold it at a slightly lower price... Something else to consider I think!
customer_reviews.author: joel card

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua approved!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, chihuahuas are notoriously picky eaters. I feed Ziggy Wellness Small Breed dry kibble and figured he would benefit from some wet food. I ordered this vegetarian food because I know it's nutritious, but also because the price was right. As I filled his bowl, Ziggy was jumping with excitement (it smells good, even to me, lol). He happily scarfed it down when I put the bowl down. The dog is happy, so I'm happy. Couldn't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Little Fish

customer_reviews.title: This food is the best
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have loved it for years now! Funny thing is if my friends bring their dogs for me to watch they are always wanting to eat my kids veggie dog food! Loll Super gentle on their tummies too! I began using the food cause it’s low in sodium for my girl Rheannon who had an enlarged heart. This food helped her live 6 more years with me. She was so special and very worth the effort to find it. I was very relieved years later to find Amazon carried it! Thank You Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Here in ocean city

customer_reviews.title: Cans dent and smashed.
customer_reviews.text: Even I gave 5 stars before, now I am really upset with the conditions the cans are arriving my house. I did not say anything before, but always in the package 3 or 4 cans are damaged with dents. I need them when they arrive, so as I don’t see the cans leaks I use this way, but today is too much. Almost all can are like if somebody were playing soccer with them, I will not return, because I need for my dog, but I think I deserve at least and apology and to receive a new package without charge. This cans are good to trash it out.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: My dog and my nose approve!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff! And I love that the smell doesn't make me want to vomit...I will definitely be buying this again. The only downside is the quantity of food needed-I feed this to my dog once a day, (feeding her kibble for her other feeding), and I have to feed her 1 can minimum to fill her up (she is 40 pounds)-at around $2 a can, it can get a little spendy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelse P.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY picky Chihuahua loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our Chihuahua turns his nose up at every dog food. We've tried all different brands, all different flavors. We had to fight with him to eat anything, and then he went on a hunger strike and wouldn't eat at all. I decided to try this brand of vegan dog food, and he actually likes it!! All of the nonvegan brands we've tried, all different types of meat and flavors, didn't like any of them. But he loves a vegan one. Go figure. Guess this is what we will be buying from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: dirt inside a pack, also missing label on some of can food.
customer_reviews.text: A pack of 〝Natural Balance Ultra Premium Wet Dog Food〞delivered in 5/24/19,I did not open it until today, when I open a box, a lot of dirt inside the box, also, some of can food doesn't have a label on it, were there are Natural balance Ultra Premium wet dog food?
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware of reactions
customer_reviews.text: I fed this to my two dogs. One developed spots on her stomach. The other had behavior changes. Hiding in the corner, lameness in her front end. If I picked her up, she would scream as though I hurt her. This would happen in the mornings. At the day went on, she would return to her normal self. When I figured out it was this food, I stopped feeding it and she has not had a problem since that day
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: I have become vegan and felt terrible about killing other animals to feed my animals, so I tried this. I have an older dog with few teeth and extremely picky and two younger dogs. When I put this in front of my older dog she lapped it right up. I gave it to my two younger dogs with the same response! And I can recycle the cans! Just ordered two more cases
customer_reviews.author: pickyunee

customer_reviews.title: BE CAUTIOUS of rotten food/strange materials
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this dog food, especially from amazon. My dog has been eating this brand for 2 years and the past few months I’ve had nothing but issues with my dog food cases arriving ROTTEN or with giant pieces of HARD material which is a CHOKING HAZARD to dogs!! Both my orders and my mother in law’s orders (her dog eats same brand and kind) has arrived rotten. DISGUSTING. I have emailed the company directly with a picture.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Good food for a special diet Yorkie.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! As with all NB, their dog food is good quality. I found that my Yorkie puppy has a very rare kidney issue similar to the kidney stone/crystals that cats are known for. His new diet suggests a low-purine diet and this NB Vegetarion food is perfect! My little boy is not a fan so I do have to Spruce it up with a bit of shredded cheese to make it more appealing. The food itself has a very sticky consistency. Sticks to the spoon and to your fingers. Whether it is fresh opened room temp or refrigerated.
customer_reviews.author: Terracotta Gardens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dogs with vegan diets
customer_reviews.text: Our dog develops bladder stones if she eats any animal protein. This food has been part of her diet (which is now vegan as per our vet ) for over 3 years. This has helped in her keep the stones away! Great product
customer_reviews.author: John Sairfo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price on this many cans you get
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. Its all very natural as Ive checked out all the ingredients. My dog was allergic to all chicken, turkey and beef so I had to find something different. She loves the chunks of vegetables and even will eat my regular vegetables now. This is a great price on this many cans you get, a lot better than in stores, if you can even find it. I prefer to refrigerate it and then microwave a little before giving it to my dog. Her coat, teeth and overall health have improved since about 8 months of eating this food. She's 12 and super healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned that maybe my dog will not like a vegan canned dog food
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that maybe my dog will not like a vegan canned dog food, but she goes nuts and is excited.It smells nice and she hasn't had any allergic reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: ... the can began to stick & caused what looked like a hard dark brown rusting substance
customer_reviews.text: The sediments of the food in the can began to stick & caused what looked like a hard dark brown rusting substance. The food has an awful smell to it. Although my dogs don't seem to mind the food, it does not meet my approval. The 12-pack also arrived to me with many dents in most of the cans, which could contain botulism and poison my puppies. After feeding them 2 cans, I've decided I won't feed the rest to them. Waste of time + Waste of money. I think I'll just try out the HALO Vegan products next since Natural Balance didn't even meet its expected quality assurance.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great soft food option for vegan dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our vegan dog had to have a gum surgery and had to be on soft food for 10 days. We mixed this in with his regular dry food that had been soaked in water and mashed up. He never once had stomach upset and he loved the flavor. The water content is also really high so it kept him well hydrated even though he didn't feel like drinking because of the meds. He made a full recovery and still gets a spoonful every now and then as a treat. There's no disgusting dog food smell and the fact that it didn't upset his sensitive stomach was a real win.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it
customer_reviews.text: My boys loves it and he is healthier for not consuming an overload of protein that causes organ failure in older dogs like with the meat heavy formulas of most commercial foods. He is a little picky but always eats this! He looks healthier than ever since switching. I feel like this is a high grade food, will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vegan dog food
customer_reviews.text: Even though the product title specifically refers to this as a "vegetarian" formula, this food is actually vegan, and it's apparently also free of wheat, soy, and corn (common digestive irritants for dogs). A lot of comparable dog foods are quite expensive, so the bulk packaging really helps with the price point. My dog is happy and eats the stuff ravenously. It does smell shockingly good--and not just for dog food!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This is Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My only "Beef" is that I keep receiving cans that are dented. That's not COOL! Please ship this item better. Thanks! My dogs love this food and I'm confident the quality is there. Just not the packaging and I don't think it's completely safe to use dented cans....
customer_reviews.author: Ms Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Poisoned my dog!!
customer_reviews.text: This wet food should have been included with the recent recalls by the J.M. Smucker company. My dog is now deathly I'll after opening a new can for breakfast from a case we received early March.
customer_reviews.author: Susy Q

customer_reviews.title: Great if your dog has skin allergies!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since switching my dog to this Natural Balance vegetarian formula, after YEARS of battling with allergies she no longer on any medication for allergies and her skin is completely cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: NatLove

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite but ok
customer_reviews.text: Used to like this as my favorite vegetarian dog food but now I think it has not enough protein %. I am looking for more for my older dog. I also notice that he clears his throat more when eating this, maybe is causes plegm, not sure. Anyhow. It is ok as a back up for us. At least there are some veg brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: CA travelmom

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for two dogs. My most recent dog is a rescue and smelled horribly. When we started her on this food we noticed a big change in how she smelled, much better! I also like that this vegetarian.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to receive this item, when ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this item, when i opened the first can i was so dissapointed. The food is so dry i can hardly get it out of the can. Makes me wonder how long its been sitting on their warehouse shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Esby

customer_reviews.title: Good tasty meal with good ingredients at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Good texture and ingredients. I personally do not like the smoky scent, but my little one doesn’t seem to mind it. I’ve notice sligh change in its consistency - bot a while ago it was more hardy, while now is more watery and soft. Still like it and I hope the manufacturer wouldn’t “improve” its formula. Overal 9 out of 10. Would love to have more vegan options with real/healthy ingredients on the market. Keep up the good work and thank you for stepping in and offering this vegan dog food. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Once you try Vegan you never go back...

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product is fake but I recently ordered these cans from Amazon and the wet food has a different texture, it is very gooey and sticky... will try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: sbpa

customer_reviews.title: Glad there is an affordable product that doesn't contribute to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding this vegan formula to my Chihuahua mix since she was rescued at only 11 weeks old. She absolutely loves it! She is now pushing 5 and she couldn't be healthier. She has a tremendous amount of energy and no deficiencies. Glad there is an affordable product that doesn't contribute to animal cruelty, helps aid my pup's health and saves our environment. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: DanIsYoBoi

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it and had no issues
customer_reviews.text: My dog is vegan and after trying different brands, she loves this one and it’s very good for her stomach, she’s about 12 pounds and eats half can daily. Also she eats some dry food from v-dog
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: My shih tzu it sensative (throwing up and constant UTIs) ...
customer_reviews.text: My shi tzu it sensative (throwing up and constant UTIs) to almost every protein. We tried raw, freeze dried, limited ingredient, rotation, high protein, low protein... Finally we tried this veg based food and it was a success! Now we mix with yogurt and lentils. For a year she's had one UTI and throws up only when she gets into her brother's food Update: Sept 2016: new formula is soft and mushy, much more difficult to keep the flat face of my shih tzu clean
customer_reviews.author: R. Oremland

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES being a vegan like his mama
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES being a vegan like his mama, and he LOVES this dog food! He is normally a very picky eater, but he can't get enough of this wet food. All of the ingredients are natural and healthy- simply a combination of plants from our beautiful planet! Thank you for creating, as well as providing, this product to all our us and our dawgs/dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Had to spend a lot of money due to my doy getting sick. Most of the cans had damage/dents, I gave him the one can without the dent and was also damaged or infected. Dog spent a week with antibiotics. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Piedra

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We mix 1/4 can of this with a few small scoops of Halo vegan and our senior Parson Russell Terrier gobbles it up! A pop top would save time (he is usually begging for his food) but NBD.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyHW

customer_reviews.title: the vet recommended a low protein diet
customer_reviews.text: 6 months a go my dog was diagnose with stage 4 kidney decease, the vet recommended a low protein diet, instead of getting the one at the pet store that has 23 percent protein I been using Natural Balance with 18 percent protein. (a combination of both Natural Balance dry and can food) 6 months follow up my dog's labs results are great, the kidney is stable and the decease has not worsen! I really credit a good chunk to the vegetarian protein for this results, thank you Natural Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Healthy, Per My Schnauzer
customer_reviews.text: My little 8-plus year old Schnauzer rescue loves the canned mixed with the hard food. Her vet says she is amazingly active for her age, and she is also happy and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Love this food- is a little dry
customer_reviews.text: Love this food, we usually buy it at the grocery store, but thought we'd give Amazon a try. The food arrived in perfect condition, in our case it was not expired, and has a similar expiration date to the cans we buy at WF (two years out). The food is a little drier than the WF cans, as some other reviewers mentioned, which is really weird, but my dog ate it up just the same, and it wasn't so dry that I was concerned about giving it to him. I don't know if I would have noticed if not for previous reviews. In all, I will definitely purchase again for the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Won't get again
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and have enjoyed the dry vegetarian formula in the past, but this stuff missed the mark. I ignored negative reviews on this product and decided to see for myself, but this canned food is indeed way too dry. I like to mix a little wet food into my dogs' kibble just to add some flavor and texture, but this stuff is absolutely impossible to mix in. It has the consistency of dry Thanksgiving stuffing. My dogs will eat it but they're definitely not enjoying it like the Canidae salmon wet food I have used in the past, which I will be switching back to.
customer_reviews.author: KaceFace

customer_reviews.title: My dog would not eat it.
customer_reviews.text: To put it simply - she would barely lick it and refused to eat it and she LOVES canned food. Had to get a refund and donated the rest to a shelter. (I hope they'll eat it.) I was surprised because I've used Natural Balance dog and cat food before. I trust the brand but this one just didn't work for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: jbdean

customer_reviews.title: Food flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t like I try with three cans and still don’t wanna eat I change the food and try your product but I’m sorry I’m not gonna but it again thanks
customer_reviews.author: DANIELA

customer_reviews.title: My dog didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: In transitioning my dog to a vegan diet I have made many attempts with this canned food as part of the mix, but my dog, unless very hungry, seems totally uninterested in this. I like the dry food version of this, but I now mix it with the AvoDerm vegan wet food instead and my pup is in love. I'm sure this is fine, but all in all, my dog didn't care for it so now I have to sneak it little by little into her food to make my way through the remaining cans.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Healthy. Humane. Dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really love this food. They eat it with as much gusto as their previous meat-based wet food (and my dogs don't have refined palettes or anything. They have been raised on store brand dry & wet foods like purina pro-plan).
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good, healthy food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating these for years and loves them. Only thing is sometimes they show up really damaged but it's not the company's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this dog food. I refuse to give my dog the crap you find at most stores. The ingredients are usually disgusting. Not in this dog food!! Quality ingredients and no animal byproducts.
customer_reviews.author: mary m

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this food for awhile for my dog. It's wonderful and healthy, and has made her bulldog rashes non-existent. However, with this order we just received, the food in the can was extremely dry and powdery. I had to basically rehydrate it and mix with other stuff to get my dog to eat it. I've never had a problem before and not really sure why this batch is the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Plant-based Food for your pooch
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats V-Dog food for his kibble so sometimes I top it with a meat - based soft food but he always eats this vegetarian canned soft food. And he is a picky eater for a dog. Highly recommend. No one, not humans or other omnivores like dogs should have meat every day.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sunderland

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this brand. Sometimes I mix it with their kibble. Two chubby chihuahua did are losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: cn

customer_reviews.title: My 4 LOVed it
customer_reviews.text: When my 4 rescues got their first whiff of this canned food,they turned into a throng of veg-thirsty monsters. They nearly killed me getting to the food. I have never seen them so insane over food like they were today. It's not like I starve them or deprive them of good food..they just went berserk right off the bat. So that is my review. As well as I can write it.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Ours Westie has food allergies and our Vet recommended this brand for him. We also get the dry food equivalent and mix them together for him. He loves it! His favorite is the canned dog food.
customer_reviews.author: SW Michigan Guy

customer_reviews.title: My 5 dogs LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hate the dry vegetarian natural balance but I have never seen dogs love a canned food so much. They absolutely devour it!
customer_reviews.author: Deato

customer_reviews.title: Great vegetarian dog food
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to meat-based dog food. Dog loves it. Wish it was organic though.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: This product works ok for my dog.. although ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok for my dog.. although his stomach can handle it.. he has other issues.. they add a smokey flavor for what ever reason as a result the dog is always licking his but.. which didnt happen on other vegetarian formulas..
customer_reviews.author: Df186

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs can't get enough of this and don't want to eat their dried kibble anymore! I love that it is better for the planet, healthy, and better for the animals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great for my vegan dogs -just add some ground flax seed and a little olive oil and they’re happy and healthy. However, the condition of the cans varies. Last shipment, almost 40% of the cans were dented. Some so badly I could not use them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love to chow down on this as long as they don't get it every day
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really eat this up if it's a sometimes thing. If I feed it to them too often they get tired of it, like anything else, I suppose. As I understand it, unlike the dry vegan Natural Balance this does not deliver complete nutrition to them, so I wouldn't make it a regular food anyway. They eat a lot of the dry too, and various other stuff. They've been vegan for pretty much their whole lives and always come back from the vet with a clean bill of health, and this is part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Anaiscourt

customer_reviews.title: It seems like the last case I got was a different formula ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. It seems like the last case I got was a different formula as the consistency was mushy and not firm like the other cases I have received. I give my dog his pills in a little bit of this and now it is like putting the pills in peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne F.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised my dog seems to like this as much as meat flavored varieties of similar texture
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is on the drier side of wet foods with a mechanically altered consistency (slightly chunky, not pureed). I was surprised my dog likes this one as much as meat flavored ones with similar consistency. The can requires a can opener. It is one of the least expensive veterinary recommended wet foods I have come across. Customer service has been excellent, with speedy deliver and quick replacement of damaged cans.
customer_reviews.author: Ttv

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it and vegan!!
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ask for. I only wish there were more varieties!
customer_reviews.author: tara mansion

customer_reviews.title: An all natural cure for my pup's skin problems!!!
customer_reviews.text: My poor little malti tzu had terrible skin problems. We tried everything from prescriptions to shampoos to try and help him. Once I switched his diet to this vegan food, he was CURED. No more vet visits or medicine - this did it!!! I originally had him on the dry formula but now that he's getting older and his teeth aren't so good, I was so glad to find it came canned also. It's been about 3 years since I started him on this food and he is looking and feeling better than ever! :)
customer_reviews.author: CT Customer

customer_reviews.title: My animals love this!
customer_reviews.text: This canned food has become a MAJOR staple of in the diet of both my cats and my dog. They love it! Especially sprinkled with some nutritional yeast flakes. I love that it's cruelty-free, and they love the taste. Definitely try it with your pets. I'm on my fourth re-order now :-)
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in condition. I opened one can and the food looks great and my dogs loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it, and 4 of my friends dogs love it now
customer_reviews.text: Best vegan dog canned food !! My dog inhales it. Sometimes I add water and heat it up like soup for her
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: The Best.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs eat the vegan Natural Balance but my oldest dog is starting to get picky. She is bossy like that so I figured I would start mixing some wet food into her kibble. It worked right away. This is a well balanced food, my dogs love it and it is easy to hide medicine in lol. Amazon had this at my door in 48 hours, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: marriediimuzik

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff! And he is the pickiest dog I have ever met.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food and I feel better about feeding them ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I feel better about feeding them a cruelty free product. I notice the benefits also extend to their itching less, no upset stomach, fur is in better condition, sleeping better, less bloating/gas and being less hyped up then with other foods. They also maintain weight better and overall see healthier. Will continue to purchase this product. I recommend it often.
customer_reviews.author: CLW17

customer_reviews.title: Not appealing to any of my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs wouldn't eat any of it and it is very dense and thick.
customer_reviews.author: Healthcare

customer_reviews.title: Dented cans galore
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this and I had it on subscription for some time because it is more reasonably priced than in stores. I am taking a star off for all the dented cans and cancelled my subscription for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Bookish lady

customer_reviews.title: and 10 months and they all absolutely love this food
customer_reviews.text: An official Pet Nanny gives 2 thumbs way up!!!! I have 3 labs ages 5, 4, and 10 months and they all absolutely love this food. We use great kibble such as great life buffalo or earthborn lamb and about 3 tblspoons of this wet food. They go crazy over their meals. I also take care of hundreds of other dogs of all shapes and sizes. Every single dog I watch just loves this food. You will love it! I buy a case a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gray

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: The dog food is very good. However one can within the case was crushed beyond use. Did not occur with shipping. Ordering from Amazon is not cost effective if there is no mechanism for reimbursement for damaged goods.
customer_reviews.author: DrDi

customer_reviews.title: Helped with grass eating
customer_reviews.text: I decided to feed this veg blend to my pup in addition to meaty dry and wet food because he was eating lots of grass, it solved the issue
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Quality food
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on the vegetarian formula. It sounds like a vegetarian diet in this format would be fine nutritionally for my dogs. I also feed my dogs a grain free dry food in combo with this and supplement with my quality homemade biscuits. I would not personally choose an all vegetarian diet for my furkids but this seems a fine arrangement.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee

customer_reviews.title: Fake smoke added
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why they add a fake smoky product to this food ,dog like the food but my chiwienie starts sneezing before she eats it .I don't want to smell the smoky scent.so if not changed will be buying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Harris

customer_reviews.title: quality control
customer_reviews.text: I usually have good luck with this product though the last shipment was odd in texture. I guess it was okay,as after I blended the food it was fine. It was almost as though it had sat for a prolonged time and settled.
customer_reviews.author: V. Allen

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it. I would suggest you give it a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really vegan formula. I use it with my meat hard food (no lamb at all in any of my food). I put a tbsp. mixed it. They don't need all meat. The dogs love it. I would suggest you give it a try. Decent price.
customer_reviews.author: mfrallie

customer_reviews.title: Gasless.
customer_reviews.text: Fartless. I truly mean it. Since switching to this food my dog hasn't farted once. And I mean he could have been used at Guantenamo Bay for torture that's how bad it was getting. Now, nothing. Just for that it's great food and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: DOG SEEMS TO EAT IT AS NO OTHER OPTION BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: DOG SEEMS TO EAT IT AS NO OTHER OPTION BUT IT REALLY SEEMS DOG'S FIRST CHOICE IS TO EAT SOMETHING ELSE SPECIALLY IF IT HAS MEAT...THEIR NATURAL DIET.
customer_reviews.author: OM

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this stuff. I don't know what else to say. He does occasionally encounter a whole chickpea that he refuses to eat, but aside from that he's lined up waiting for dinner every night.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love this! I have one that will lay down while eating, not when this is in his dinner.. he has to stand and make sure he gets it in.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Product variation
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a while. The last 2 shipments the product has been different. The food is dry and more chunky. Not happy with the change
customer_reviews.author: Harsh M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my aging mixed breed dog. I have always fed my dog dry food, but he has had some recent health issues which led him to be a little pickier of an eater, plus he takes supplements now that I can easily add to this canned food to get him to eat. I love that it's vegetarian. He still eats a portion of dry food which has meat, so I think this is a nice balance to his diet.
customer_reviews.author: bosco

customer_reviews.title: My vegan Chihuahua/Pomeranian and my Pekingese both love this food
customer_reviews.text: My vegan Chihuahua/Pomeranian and my Pekingese both love this food. They've been eating it for about 4 years with no issues whatsoever. There is sometimes variations in the consistency of the food which can be annoying, but generally I have had good experiences with it. I like to supplement this food with some fresh cooked sweet potato and rice, and I normally mix it with some Natural Balance dry vegetarian dog food as well.
customer_reviews.author: vegancarrie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was horrible! It was thick and sticky and just gross
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some canned food to mix with the dry. This stuff was horrible! It was thick and sticky and just gross. None of my 4 dogs seemed to really like it very much - certainly weren't excited as they typically are over canned food.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: my dogs liked this food
customer_reviews.text: my dogs liked this food, but I wish it was not so thick. I like to mix it with their kibble, but I usually had to add some water to thin it out.
customer_reviews.author: terry rosemore

customer_reviews.title: Helps dogs get the veggies they need. Tasty, even to my dog who is used to animal protein.
customer_reviews.text: Not vegan like their kibble. I don't believe in denying dogs animal protein, but this sure helps them get the veggies they need. Recipe is not dominated by sweet potato, so it won't make for bad diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: bb2012sg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs can only eat vegetarian/vegan because of liver problems. We are very grateful for this canned dog Food.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDweller

customer_reviews.title: Very Dry for a Canned Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't like this dog food, but I wonder if it was in the best condition, another reviewer stated the product, when received from Amazon, was dryer than when purchased in the local market. The product did appear dry for a canned food. My dog likes most food, table scraps, etc but wanted nothing to do with this. If I see it locally I will buy a can and compare.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are nuts over it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. I have two Minature Schnauzers. I am on my second case, and they never seem to tire of it. I mix it in with kibble. I like it because it does not smell bad, as dog food usually does. Will definately re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Albert

customer_reviews.title: Does your dog have allergies?
customer_reviews.text: If your animal has allergies from normal dog food, then this is the answer for you... these vegetarian cans of dog food are great for that animal that has skin allergies... by the case, a decent price and Amazon Prime got it shipped free... Great way to save money on specialty dog food.... Our dog seems to love it... and he no longer itches.... Super buy
customer_reviews.author: James R. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great vegetarian alternative for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this vegetarian food. As a vegetarian, I have been so conflicted about feeding my dog animal products. This product has all of the nutrients required for health and growth and I am expecting greater longevity because he won't be exposed to all of the carcinogenic materials and drugs so prevalent in the garbage animal product pet foods.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery box was complete open with seal ripped.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have any issues with the product but the box it was delivered in was completely open. I came out immediately to take the box so it was opened before being delivered. Did someone check to see if there was something worth stealing in there?
customer_reviews.author: SunLight

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best. My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog has some sort of allergies. After numerous trips to the Vet they kept saying it was a food allergy (still not sure). So I had to change her food. This stuff is the best. My dog loves it. Will never feed her anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: For vegans or not for vegans, alone or with added meat
customer_reviews.text: Healthy dog food which serves as a base for my two terriers....I put shredded meat on top...have for years and seems great nutrition
customer_reviews.author: KATHRYN

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan food option for dogs
customer_reviews.text: Nice affordable option for a vegan owner. I mix this with some salmon food for a bit of variety and by venison occasionally too. But, this serves as the bulk of my dogs food. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: EnelradSedir

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok but my dogs hate it because it has a baby poop texture. Very sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog really likes this flavor, she always eats it all.
customer_reviews.author: traceysrayofsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves the Natural Balance Vegetarian Formula!
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through countless types of dog food. Some our dog will only take a single bite of and walk away. However, she loves this Natural Balance Vegetarian Formula Canned Dog Food! We've tried several of the other Natural Balance Canned varieties and she loves this one the most. It's a great product with great ingredients! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Giguere

customer_reviews.title: Our boxer loves it
customer_reviews.text: This canned vegetarian mixed with the bagged hard vegetarian greatly pleases my very allergic boxer with no allergic reactions. It seems to add that extra something that entices her into eating... The canned seems to help her gain a little more weight, too. We are fans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I found.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. My dog can't digest animal protein so a vegetarian diet is essential for him. There are very few brands that have a vegetarian diet (I've only found 3) and Natural Balance is the ONLY one he will eat. He loves the dry food also. The vet said the brand I was feeding him before vegetarian (very expensive well know brand) had so much protein it was actually making him sicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Currently listed at $12.99. This is a great price for this quality product. I have see some reviews where there have been complaints about the cans being damaged. I've bought 3 cases and all of my cans have been in great shape. I plan on buying even more just in case the price goes up.
customer_reviews.author: Xenli

customer_reviews.title: My Dog's Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My dog LOVES this stuff. We have tried several other soft foods, and this is the winner by far. Very nutritious and delicious for her!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

product_meta.title: Natural Balance Ultra Premium Wet Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Vegetarian| Size:13-OunceThis Ultra Premium canned formula is designed to provide all breeds of adult dogs with complete and balanced nutrition in an alternative to meat-based diets. Our Vegetarian Canned Dog Formula offers your pet the same essential nutrients found in diets with meat as the primary protein source, but this formula is made without animal or dairy products. FEEDING MANAGEMENT: Serve at room temperature.Any unused portion should be covered and refrigerated.Fresh clean water should be available at all times! ADULT DOGS: The amounts in the table are intended as guidelines only. The food intake should be adjusted according to the age, weight and activity of your dog. It is important for your dog's health to maintain a proper body weight. Consult a veterinarian for specific weight recommendations.
feature_bullets: Contains 12 - 13 Ounce Cans of Wet Dog Food
Same essential nutrients as formulas with meat
With brown rice, cracked barley, oatmeal and fresh carrots
